extendedInfo.description: Get ready to blast off on an epic jumping journey with Mega Jump! Collect coins, grab crazy powerups, and evade monsters to boost yourself to the edge of the Universe and beyond!Mega Jump has got what you need:â Eye-popping cartoon graphics and beautiful multi-layered backdropsâ Grab the Fireball and Super Nova Mega Boosts and hang on for a fiery ride!â Collect coins and stars for big points and huge combo boosts!â Turn into a Balloon! Strap on some Jump Boots! Become a Coin Magnet! Hover with the Action Umbrella or zap enemies with the Power Shield!â Multiple stages - try to reach the edge of space and beyond! â Reached the final stage? Try the Hard stages for an extra challenge!â Watch out for killer items and monsters that'll stop you dead in your tracks!â Unlock all kinds of awesome new characters to play with!â Hilarious sound effects and a bumping sound track!â Regular updates with new features and upgrades!â Dozens of unlockable achievements for maximum gamerscore!â Online worldwide leaderboards with Feint!â Compete with your friends on Facebook and Twitter!What are you waiting for? Grab Mega Jump and start jumping! "Superb" - Slide to Play"Incredibly addictive" - GamezeboâYouâll be amazed with how long youâre going to be playing!â - AppmodoHonors:Mega Jump has over 22 million players and counting! Thanks to all the Mega Jumpers out there!Join us on the Mega Jump Facebook page:http://www.facebook.com/MegaJumpFollow us on Twitter:http://twitter.com/megajumpgame

reviews.title: Needs to be upgraded
reviews.comment: I love this game on my ipod, so I decided to buy it on my phone. IT NEEDS TO BE UPGRADED. It seems to only be made for iphone and there are too many inconsistensies and blank spaces to make the game enjoyable. Please update soon.
reviews.author: Donald Harvey

reviews.title: Constantly loading
reviews.comment: I\'m always having to come across a FREAKING LOAD SCREEN!!!!! AAAAHHHH ITS ANNOYING please fix it can\'t even enjoy this game but its really fun on my ipod why not this PLEASE FIX GET SET GAMES INC.
reviews.author: diego perez

reviews.title: Glitch!
reviews.comment: I love Mega Jump a lot! But theres a glitch that I experience where once I unlocked a stage,  it goes back to being locked after a while. Please fix this and I wud appreciate this game more. Thanks.
reviews.author: eric chen

reviews.title: BRILLIANT
reviews.comment: I love mega jump! It\'s a really good fun game that any could easily pick up and start to play!
reviews.author: Zo\303\253 M

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Awesome beautiful graphics and pretty funny! The different boards give the game variety. Great way to pass the time!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super!
reviews.comment: I love this game! There may be a few bugs here and there, but for me, these are so little that they don\'t ruin the fun. And let\'s be honest almost every good game has some bugs
reviews.author: j\303\274rgen Leppsalu

reviews.title: Great game, great support, but buggy
reviews.comment: This game is super fun and highly addictive. I do get a fair number of crashes on my samsung charge, but their customer service is great. :)
reviews.author: Emily Zaehring

reviews.title: A wonderful game with Bug!!
reviews.comment: my stages automatically \'\'re\'\'lock after I replayed it. Other than that, this game is simple, beautiful and wonderful!
reviews.author: Liew Kok Fei

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Its a fun challenging game that passes time u can hve fun with an it has good graphics plus u can buy different characters I say good deal for a mobile game
reviews.author: Jordan Shomo

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This is an enjoyable game it is upbeat and fun. I would recommend this for all ages :)
reviews.author: Natalie Brown

reviews.title: Amazing game!
reviews.comment: I love how fun this game is!  It passes the time. It is challenging and very enjoyable.
reviews.author: Taylor Sullivan

reviews.title: Too many bugs..
reviews.comment: Even though I\'v unlocked all levels, city of mists and fire smthng levels kp locking themselves.. no mattr hw mny tyms i unlock..
reviews.author: Havan Agrawal

reviews.title: Gets Old Fast!
reviews.comment: Addictive but the boring, and my Nexus 7 won\'t let me get Mega Run. DKW( Dont Know Why) .
reviews.author: Susana Escobar

reviews.title: Please update!
reviews.comment: Played this game for a long time on iOS, it is one of my favorite mobile games. But please update the Android version with the content  that is already aviable on the iOS version for quite some time. Android users want to experience the new stuff too (worlds, lvl design, menus a.s.o.)!
reviews.author: Sebastian Berger

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work!!!
reviews.comment: I have the HTC One X && always loved this game. But,ever since this game updated, it doesn\'t work anymore! I\'ve tried deleting it, then downloading it again, but it still doesn\'t work. Please, fix this ASAP! I love this game. ):
reviews.author: Brandi Hoffman

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: First impression, WOW! great game and really great time killer. Deserve 5 stars. I have a request to ask, can you guys make the Mega Run playable on Xperia U as well? Thanks dev, have a nice day.
reviews.author: Setsuna Jay

reviews.title: Its good however
reviews.comment: I never receive any free mega points after completing offers within the app. fix this and i will rate 5 star
reviews.author: B DREW

reviews.title: New update
reviews.comment: I\'ve always loved this game. I\'ve used it on an iPhone, S2, and now on a nexus 4. But the most recent update (that adds the magica package) is buggy. Once you level up, you lose a previously won level. :\'( please fix and this will be a 5 star game.
reviews.author: Lydia Hancock

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy tab 2     7 inch
reviews.comment: Its ok not very addictive though wich is a bit of a let down I would pay for this app though
reviews.author: Chaz Orchard

reviews.title: Good, but...
reviews.comment: Should require less MP (in game currency) to unlock the other levels. I am not that committed... But I do want to play the galactic core level!
reviews.author: Keegan Kaczor
